body.p: New hardware for Gentoo developers at OSU! Donated AMD64s are opening this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter, back to its usual schedule. All the usual sections carry interesting news and other things Gentoo, including a French developer of the week, and -- a first -- an exercise in coding from some of his area of expertise. International events from Canada and Japan, press clippings from Germany and the US, and the obligatory community news, bugzilla statistics and security bulletins are included, too. Hope you like it.
